verse.gurmukhi: qwrn kI khw nYku nB n inhwirXo jwie sUrj kI joiq qhw cMdR kI n jOn hY ]
verse.unicode: ਤਾਰਨ ਕੀ ਕਹਾ ਨੈਕੁ ਨਭ ਨ ਨਿਹਾਰਿਯੋ ਜਾਇ ਸੂਰਜ ਕੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਤਹਾ ਚੰਦ੍ਰ ਕੀ ਨ ਜੌਨ ਹੈ ॥

en.bdb: Neither there could come the Sunrays, nor the Moonlight enters Neither there were the gods visible, nor were seen the demons.

ss.gurmukhi: auQy qwirAW dI kI bswq, AwkwS vI zrw ijMnw vyiKAw nhIN jw skdw। auQy nw sUrj dI rOSnI hY Aqy nw hI cMdRmw dI cwdnI (idsdI hY)।

verse.gurmukhi: dyv n inhwirXo dYq koaU n ibhwirXo jhw pMCI kI n gMmRX qhw cItI ko n gOn hY ]79]

en.bdb: Neither it was approachable to the birds, nor the insects could trod in.(79)

ss.gurmukhi: auQy nw koeI dyvqw idsdw hY Aqy nw koeI dYNq ivcrdw hY। auQy nw koeI pMCI phuMc skdw hY Aqy nw hI kIVI jw skdI hY ]79]
